title: IT HELPDESK - TIER 1 - USA-FL-Deerfield Beach
text:
40 hit(s) 
Profile 
Roig Lawyers is a minority owned litigation firm delivering a different experience of extraordinary and uncommon character and unprecedented attitude behind first-rate legal work. Our core values of loyalty, integrity, diversity and teamwork are characteristic of the work culture we offer at Roig Lawyers. Roig Lawyers is currently interviewing for a full-time IT HELPDESK position to assist in technical support. Previous Help Desk experience required. Law firm experience a plus. Responsibilities: Track support tickets from submission to resolution Moving computer/printer equipment from offices/cubicles Assisting in the setup of office telephones for new hires Troubleshoot, diagnose and repair computer hardware Assist IT Manager/Contractor in any additional tasks Bend, lift and carry equipment as needed Travel to other offices required/valid driver license and insurance Ability to respond quickly to internal IT needs and multi-task Law firm experience a plus. Great work environment; excellent benefits package after completion of initial probationary period. Only applicants under consideration will be contacted for an interview Company info Roig Lawyers 
Company Profile Roig Lawyers is a multi-practice Florida Litigation firm with an unfaltering growing presence in the legal market, with more than 100 attorneys in 6 offices in Deerfield Beach, Miami, Orlando, West Palm Beach, Tampa, and Tallahassee. Employer job
